kit.leader_skill: "Transformation Boost" or "Gifted Warriors" Category Ki +3, HP +200% and ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +50% for characters who also belong to the "Power Beyond Super Saiyan" Category

super_attack.name: Slash Arrow Kick
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF by 33% for 3 turns and; causes immense damage to enemy; ; raises allies' DEF by 33% for 1 turn; (self excluded)

passive_skill.name: Manifestation of True Strength
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 20% up and foresees enemy's Super Attack for 1 turn; (Once) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Damage reduction rate 50% up; As the 1st attacker in a turn: Damage reduction rate 20% up; As the 1st or 2nd attacker in a turn: ATK 50% up; Chance of performing a critical hit 30% up; When attacking: ATK 200% up; When receiving an attack: DEF 200% up; After receiving an attack: Launches an additional Super Attack; After the enemy launches a Super Attack at the character: Launches an additional Super Attack

active_skill.name: Galick Gun
active_skill.effect: Greatly raises ATK temporarily; Causes ultimate damage to enemy; ATK +33% for 1 turn
